_header: In that time God Jesus / To His disciples said thus
Title(s): In festo sancti Martini confessoris; Northern Homily Cycle
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo sancti Martini confessoris’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN þat tyme God IhesusTo his disciples seide
                    þus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Wȝuche ben sauered and studefastIn heuenliche wisdam
                    euer to last

                poet.a.1,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
